data.name: Ricochet - Super Level Pack
data.detailed_description: The super level pack features two new exciting levels for you to play. In one level, you must uses the constantly moving rocks to traverse around the map and keep from falling into the bottom while lava constantly rises. In the other level, you must avoid drops as they fall and pick them up before they self destruct. Both levels feature new twists and some of the original gameplay.
data.about_the_game: The super level pack features two new exciting levels for you to play. In one level, you must uses the constantly moving rocks to traverse around the map and keep from falling into the bottom while lava constantly rises. In the other level, you must avoid drops as they fall and pick them up before they self destruct. Both levels feature new twists and some of the original gameplay.
data.short_description: Play two new exciting Ricochet levels with your friends. One level has you jumping to avoid lava, while the other has you dodging drop pods to pick up new rewards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
